output_list.description: The distribute function has an integer overflow in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. The attack exploits the following vulnerability: Integer Overflow, Wrong Logic, Access Control, Typo Constructor, Bad Randomness, Token Devalue.

The PayWinner function has a bad randomness in the line `if (_direction == 0 && maxTickets < 20) maxTickets += 1;`. The attack demonstrates the following vulnerability: Integer Overflow, Typo Constructor, Bad Randomness.

The PayWinner function has a denial of service in the line `if (_direction == 0 && maxTickets < 20) maxTickets += 1;`. The attack demonstrates the following vulnerability: Integer Overflow, Typo Constructor, Denial of Service.

The PayWinner function has a bad randomness in the line `if (_direction == 0 && maxTickets < 20) maxTickets += 1;`. The attack demonstrates the following vulnerability: Integer Overflow, Typo Constructor, Bad Randomness.
